verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:28
verses.text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him, then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him, that God may be all in all.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:29
verses.text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead, if the dead rise not at all? why are they then baptized for the dead?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:30
verses.text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:31
verses.text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.
